entities.name: Job_Scrapper_Project
observations: Implements scalable job scraping for Naukri and Indeed platforms
Uses Playwright for detail page navigation at 10,000+ scale
LinkedIn scraper removed due to rate limiting
Batch processing with automatic database storage
Two-table optimization implemented: job_urls (fast collection) + jobs (full details)
Expected performance improvement: 80-90% speedup for subsequent scrapes
Database infrastructure complete with foreign keys and indexes

entities.name: Playwright_Architecture
observations: Async browser automation with headless=True
5 second wait for list pages, 3 seconds for detail pages
Batch size of 50 jobs with 1 second rate limiting
Successfully tested with full description extraction
Two-phase scraping: Phase 1 collects URLs only, Phase 2 enriches with details
Deduplication via LEFT JOIN query identifies unscraped URLs
Resume capability allows incremental scraping without re-collecting URLs

entities.name: Two_Table_Optimization
observations: job_urls table: job_id, platform, input_role, actual_role, url
jobs table: job_id, platform, actual_role, url, job_description, skills, company_name, company_detail, posted_date, scraped_at
Normalized input_role: lowercase with underscores
job_id generation: MD5 hash of platform + URL (16 chars)
Deduplication query: LEFT JOIN to find unscraped URLs
80-90% speedup by skipping already-collected URLs
